titleInfo.title: Discussion and performances - Southern Blood: Celebrating Gregg Allman - 2017-09-15

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Discussion and performances honoring the legacy of Gregg Allman from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 15, 2017. Participants include Michael Lehman, Luther Dickinson, Cody Dickinson, Joan Osborne, Rodney Hall and Scott Billington. Moderated by Scott Goldman. Include audio from video and selected recorded audio excerpts. In partnership with the Americana Music Association.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
